desc: Introducing Health Alert, self-testing kits designed to ensure privacy to perform your test where suits, at the time most convenience to you and delivering results in minutes. Health Alert home screening kits allow you peace of mind and confident as to whether a traditional doctor’s visit is warranted.

layout.text: YOUR LIFE IS MADE TO BE LIVED.

ARE YOU EXPERIENCING:
DISCOMFORT IN YOUR LOWER ABDOMEN?
OR PERHAPS A PAIN OR A BURNING FEELING WHEN URINATING?
HEALTH ALERT ARE AT HOME TEST KITS TO HELP YOU PUT YOUR MIND AT EASE AND LET YOU GET BACK TO LIVING YOUR LIFE.
